column4: hi i have nvidia gfx. if i set it to 1600x1200 with xrandr, ill have to pan. how do i fix it to show 1600x1200 properly?
you may have to run that as root for the settings to stick ... I'm not sure why.
but i dont want to pan. it is still virtually at 1024x768
grandr is a pretty decent graphical program for setting the resolution.  There's another one that is a display applet as well.
